Package it.polimi.ingsw.xyl.model

Class GameMaster

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.xyl.model.GameMaster
public class GameMaster
extends java.lang.Object
GameMaster is virtual model handle all the other models, just like a game master (person) can handle all the data of a game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    GameMaster()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addPlayer​(PlayerServer ps, java.lang.String playerName)
    This method is used by controller to handle with new player's connect.
    void afterGame​(java.lang.String playerName, int gameId)
    After the game ends or partially ends, place related players in game lobby, and notify them.
    void createNewGame​(java.lang.String playerName)
    To create a new game
    void deregister​(VirtualView observer)  
    void endTurn​(int gameId, int playerId, boolean finish)
    To end one's turn when no more want to use God power
    GameLobby getGameLobby()
    This method is only used for test, it should never be used in anywhere else.
    void handleBuild​(int gameId, int playerId, int workerId, Direction direction, boolean buildDome)
    To handle player's "Build" action

    To handle player's "move" action
    void joinGame​(java.lang.String playerName, int gameId)
    To join a player into a game
    void loadData()
    loadData is for persistence, the server will firstly load previous saved data file in ./data to restore the previous status of the server after the unexpected crash of the server
    void notify​(int gameId)
    notify all players of a game all the necessary data
    void notify​(VirtualGame vGame)
    Used by loadData, notify virtualView to restore virtual games

    Used by addPlayer, if player name is available, show available games to player.
    void notify​(PlayerServer ps, java.lang.String playerName, int gameId)
    Used by addPlayer, if the player reconnect with the same nickname, tell the player to wait for others or resume the game.
    void notify​(java.lang.String playerName)
    notify the player all available games
    void notifyGameEnded​(int gameId)
    If one player wins, the game ends, show all players of that game available games.
    void register​(VirtualView observer)  
    void setAvailableGodPowers​(int gameId, java.util.ArrayList<GodPower> availableGodPowers)
    This method sets available God powers of gameBoard.

    This method sets a player's God Player.
    void startGame​(int gameId, java.lang.String messageFrom, int startPlayerId)
    This method changes the turn id of a gameBoard to the "Start Player" which is chosen by the "Challenger", in our case, the "owner" of the gameBoard.

    To handle unexpected disconnection or exit game.

    • getGameLobby

      public GameLobby getGameLobby()
      This method is only used for test, it should never be used in anywhere else.
      Returns:
      the game lobby.

    • register

      public void register​(VirtualView observer)

    • deregister

      public void deregister​(VirtualView observer)

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(PlayerServer ps, java.lang.String playerName)
      This method is used by controller to handle with new player's connect.
      Parameters:
      ps - PlayerServer of a player, used to send messages
      playerName - the nickname of a player.

    • createNewGame

      public void createNewGame​(java.lang.String playerName)
      To create a new game
      Parameters:
      playerName - player name

    • joinGame

      public void joinGame​(java.lang.String playerName, int gameId)
      To join a player into a game
      Parameters:
      playerName - player name
      gameId - game ID

    • setPlayerNumber

      public void setPlayerNumber​(int gameId, int playerNumber)
      To set total player number
      Parameters:
      gameId - game ID.
      playerNumber - how may players are there in this gameBoard.

    • setAvailableGodPowers

      public void setAvailableGodPowers​(int gameId, java.util.ArrayList<GodPower> availableGodPowers)
      This method sets available God powers of gameBoard.
      Parameters:
      gameId - game ID.
      availableGodPowers - all available powers.

    • setPower4Player

      public void setPower4Player​(int gameId, int playerId, GodPower godPower)
      This method sets a player's God Player.
      Parameters:
      gameId - game ID.
      playerId - player ID.
      godPower - the God power player chose.

    • startGame

      public void startGame​(int gameId, java.lang.String messageFrom, int startPlayerId)
      This method changes the turn id of a gameBoard to the "Start Player" which is chosen by the "Challenger", in our case, the "owner" of the gameBoard.
      Parameters:
      gameId - game ID.
      messageFrom - which player this message is form
      startPlayerId - the Start Player Id

    • setInitialWorkerPosition

      public void setInitialWorkerPosition​(int gameId, int playerId, int ax, int ay, int bx, int by)
      To set workers' initial position of the player.
      Parameters:
      gameId - game ID.
      playerId - player ID.
      ax - the x coordinate of worker 0(A)
      ay - the y coordinate of worker 0
      bx - the x coordinate of worker 1(B)
      by - the y coordinate of worker 1(B)

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn​(int gameId, int playerId, boolean finish)
      To end one's turn when no more want to use God power
      Parameters:
      gameId - game ID.
      playerId - player ID.
      finish - end my turn

    • handleMove

      public void handleMove​(int gameId, int playerId, int workerId, Direction direction)
      To handle player's "move" action
      Parameters:
      gameId - game ID.
      playerId - player ID.
      workerId - worker ID.
      direction - direction

    • handleBuild

      public void handleBuild​(int gameId, int playerId, int workerId, Direction direction, boolean buildDome)
      To handle player's "Build" action
      Parameters:
      gameId - game ID.
      playerId - player ID.
      workerId - worker ID.
      direction - direction.
      buildDome - whether build dome directly (only for Atlas).

    • afterGame

      public void afterGame​(java.lang.String playerName, int gameId)
      After the game ends or partially ends, place related players in game lobby, and notify them.
      Parameters:
      gameId - game Id

    • stopGameOf

      public void stopGameOf​(java.lang.String playerName)
      To stop the game if any of the players dropped connection with server
      Parameters:
      playerName - player name

    • loadData

      public void loadData()
      loadData is for persistence, the server will firstly load previous saved data file in ./data to restore the previous status of the server after the unexpected crash of the server

    • notify

      public void notify​(PlayerServer ps, java.lang.String playerName)
      Used by addPlayer, if player name is available, show available games to player.
      Parameters:
      ps - player server
      playerName - player name

    • notify

      public void notify​(PlayerServer ps, java.lang.String playerName, int gameId)
      Used by addPlayer, if the player reconnect with the same nickname, tell the player to wait for others or resume the game.
      Parameters:
      ps - new player server
      playerName - player name
      gameId - game Id

    • notify

      public void notify​(int gameId)
      notify all players of a game all the necessary data
      Parameters:
      gameId - game Id

    • notify

      public void notify​(java.lang.String playerName)
      notify the player all available games
      Parameters:
      playerName - player's nickname

    • notify

      public void notify​(VirtualGame vGame)
      Used by loadData, notify virtualView to restore virtual games
      Parameters:
      vGame - reloaded virtual game

    • notifyGameEnded

      public void notifyGameEnded​(int gameId)
      If one player wins, the game ends, show all players of that game available games.
      Parameters:
      gameId - game Id

    • stopGame

      public void stopGame​(int gameId, java.lang.String from)
      To handle unexpected disconnection or exit game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - unexpectedly exited game id
      from - the nickname of player who dropped the connection
